attributes.review:
Was so excited to be able to talk to my fav president. Unfortunately I wasn’t able to even chat with him 😔. I also wanted to be able to practice Russian with the main man himself, Daddy Vladdy, but he wasn’t available either!! The one good thing was that I got some tickets for his big party, but I totally forgot that I have my worm’s adoption party so I can’t make it. 

💕😍🧚🏼 you really did something, now never do it again 🧚🏼😍💕
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: so when I woke up I decided to download the trump app to see all the news about my fav president who loves to build walls and fake tan for fun!! so when I downloaded the app to see our beloved Cheeto highness I noticed the succulent on my window HAD DIED. Its plastic leaves had wilted and i knew it was ‘cause of the 70 something year old guy who hides out in his bunker from time to time had done it. IM MAD. JUSTICE FOR MY SUCCULENT. Also #savebarrontrump. He deserves a better life. Kisses😘✌️
attributes.title: App made my succulent die 🤬😤

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support the best president we’ve ever had. However as soon as I opened the app my phone screen began flashing random disturbing images. Then my phone began to smoke and weirdly the smoke smelled like fake tan and Cheetos. My phone then combusted😢. Now I can’t listen to my boomer music😭. I’m writing this on my grandson’s iPod. This app is very disappointing, I would give it zero stars if I could. Bottom line is  DO NOT get this app.

-Susan
attributes.title: my phone spontaneously combusted!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I heard of it from a friend. I opened it up and was terrified. I thought this app was suppose to be child friendly. Instead I opened it and saw a rapist and child predator. I would close my eyes but I had to keep and eye out of selenor. I’m never going to download this again because of the page it opens to first. Thank you. You can do anything if you put your mind to it✨💅🏻🧚🏼just not this🧚🏼💞🍃
attributes.title: Crusty Cheeto Puff

attributes.review:
so disappointed in this app! it promotes 
• misogyny 
• racism
• homophobia
• being uneducated/ ignorant
• xenophobia
• being creepy
i found all this out after putting in my email and phone number and NOT by paying attention to what my dear dear president trump says. this app messaged me saying they’d date their daughter if she wasn’t related to them, told me to “grab em by the p*ssy” when speaking about women, said mexicans were criminals, called black lives matter protesters thugs, called covid-19 the chinese virus and so many other horrifying things that anyone with a brain and any sort of human decency would have a problem with! it’s a horrible app and anyone who gives it more than 1 star is simply a liar 🤷🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: overall just a disappointment

attributes.review: I wish I could give less than a one star rating because it doesn't even deserve that. This app has given pain to me and my entire town. The ads are excruciating and the bugs and glitches make us want to cry. This is horrible. Don't even bother trying to fix it in fact... just delete the whole thing. Do yourself a service and get rid of the whole thing
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever installed

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my caring and wonderful president but after downloading this app.. weird things started happening throughout the day. I started throwing up and while throwing up I fell in my bathtub and couldn’t get back up. Then I choked on my Powerade and life literally flashed before my eyes. After that I started to break my fingernails. This app gives you BAD KARMA.. I deleted it immediately and everything went back to normal
attributes.title: AWFUL!!!!!

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app thinking I could be of help to our wonderfully idiotic president🧚🏻🧚🏼✨✨ 
But as soon as I opened it my bird couldn’t stop pooping then he threw up on me. 
I was confused so I left the app open and when I opened it again everything I typed suddenly seemed like a 5 year old typed it😔😔😞. This app gave everyone in my family explosive diarrhea😡
I’m never downloading EVER again
Hopefully this helps some people😌🧚🏼✨✨❤️❤️
attributes.title: I can’t even🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: This app is CURSED!!! As soon as it downloaded onto my phone, a cup fell and shattered right in front of me. The glass from that went into my leg and I had to extract it myself!!! I then went outside and got attacked by a swarm OF HORNETS. YES HORNETS. They then swarmed my house and I had to get an exterminator. And to my luck, when I was outside I accidentally fell into poison ivy and got it super bad!! I just wanted to support my loving president 😡  this app is NOT the way to go. It is not worth all of the unbelievable pain !! 😿😿😫😡
attributes.title: CURSED!!

attributes.review: I was on this what I thought was a fantastic app for an amazing man when all of a sudden there were crazy lights flashing on the screen and my poor 7 year old kid, leihyha, started having a party on the ground haha! it was a seizure and I had to rub some herbs on her body until it finally stopped. It was very disappointed because it all most killed my last child!! If I could call someone to yell at them I will gladly do so!
attributes.title: Hurt my child!
